title: National debt of Ireland 2024
yAxis: National debt in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing National debt in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall National debt in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum National debt in billion U.S. dollars, about 231.85 was reported at Year 2021
The lowest National debt in billion U.S. dollars, of value 220.87 was reported at Year 2016
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes National debt in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
In general National debt in billion U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
